text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha ao aah li kitea b. tae puok anak saab puok yeung daoysaarte puok yeung mean chomnue leu a l laoh ning avei delke ban banhchouh mk aoy puok yeung haeyning avei delke ban banhchouh pi moun mk ryy? haey pitabrakd nasa puok anak pheakochraen kuchea puok del lmeusa nung chbab a l laoh
